Returns: true if the match is successful; false otherwise
Parameters: the cookie source to match against
match(org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie, org.Description: Match cookie port attribute. If the Port attribute is not specified in header, the cookie can be sent to any port. Otherwise, the request port must be in the cookie's port list.
